messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Luigi, look! It's from Bowser. “Dear pesky plumbers: The Koopalings and I have taken over the Mushroom Kingdom. The Princess is now a permanent guest at one of my seven Koopa hotels. I dare you to find her if you can.” We've got to find the Princess.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: L-Luig-gi look-k, it-t-t' f-fr-rom-m b-bow-ws-ser. "D-Dear pesk-k-ky-y-y-y p-plum-mb-bers-s t-t-th-he k-k-k-koop-perl-lin-ng-g-g-gs an-nd-d-d I h-hav-ve t-tak-ken-n over-r-r-r t-th-he M-M-M-Mus-sh-hr-room-m K-K-Kin-n-ng-gd-dom-m. T-Th-h-he p-pr-rinc-c-c-ces-ss-s-s-s is-s-s n-no a p-per-r-r-rm-man-nen-n-n g-guest-t at-t on-ne of-f-f our-r s-sev-ven-n-n k-k-k-koop-pa h-hot-tel-l-l-ls. I d-dar-r-re ou t-to f-fin-nd h-her-r if-f y-you c-can-n" W-W-WE'V-VE G-G-GOTT-T-TA F-FIN-ND T-T-THE P-PINC-C-CESS-S, AN-N-ND-D Y-Y-YOU GOTTA H-HEL-LP-P US-S

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need some secuirty, please come to the HOP desk to apply to be a HOS or security

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">New book on penis enlargement released, come and give it a read now!</font>
